meanings.sent1: The feisty cat hissed at anyone who came too close.
meanings.sent2: She can be quite feisty when someone disagrees with her.
meanings.sent3: The feisty puppy barked at its own reflection in the mirror.
meanings.sent4: Her feisty attitude was like a sharp thorn in the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The feisty old man's temper flared up at the slightest provocation.

meanings.sent1: Despite her small size, she had a feisty spirit that never backed down.
meanings.sent2: The team showed a feisty determination to win the game.
meanings.sent3: The feisty little girl insisted on climbing the tree all by herself.
meanings.sent4: Her feisty determination was a force to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The feisty horse galloped with a spirited energy across the field.

meanings.sent1: The feisty music had everyone dancing in no time.
meanings.sent2: The children were full of feisty energy after playing outside.
meanings.sent3: The feisty squirrel darted around the park, entertaining the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The feisty river flowed with an energetic rush downstream.
meanings.sent5: The feisty crowd cheered loudly at the exciting concert.
